title: TaxEasy_ZA – Lekgetho la Hao. Puo ya Hao. Ho Nolofaditswe.
tagline: Lekgetho la Hao. Puo ya Hao. Ho Nolofaditswe.
enter_full_name: Kenya lebitso la hao le feletseng
enter_id_passport: Kenya nomoro ya hao ya ID kapa pasaPoto
welcome_intro: Kalkuletara ena ya lekgetho ya setsebi e tla o thusa ho bala lekgetho la hao la lekeno la motho ka mong la Afrika Borwa ka nepo bakeng sa selemo sa lekgetho sa 2025 (1 Hlakubele 2024 - 28 Hlakola 2025).
welcome_instructions: Ka kopo tlatsa dikarolo tsohle ka nepo. Sebedisa dikonopo tsa ho tsamaya tse ka hodimo ho tsamaya pakeng tsa maqephe, mme o tsamaise toeba hodima ditshwantsho tsa matshwao a dipotso bakeng sa ditlhahiso tse thusang.
advanced_deductions_title: Ditlhakiso Tse Tswetseng Pele le tsa Mosebetsi
it_specific_deductions: Ditlhakiso Tse Ikgethileng tsa IT & Dijithale
healthcare_specific_deductions: Ditlhakiso Tse Ikgethileng tsa Bophelo bo Botle
classroom_supplies: Thepa ya ho Ruta & Thepa ya Phaposi ya ho Ruta
other_renewable: Matla a Mang a ka Nchafalang
calculation_error_message: Ho bile le phoso ha ho balwa lekgetho la hao. Ka kopo hlahloba dintlha tsa hao mme o leke hape.
footer_text: Ha ho data e bokellwang kapa e bolokwang. E latela POPIA.
age_tooltip:
Meedi ya Lekgetho (2025):
Ka tlase ho 65: R95,750
65-75: R148,217
Ka hodimo ho 75: R165,689
Haeba lekeno la hao le le ka tlase ho meedi ena, o kanna wa se ke wa hloka ho lefa lekgetho.
basic_salary_tooltip:
Khoutu 3601: Moputso wa Motheo
Moputso wa hao wa kgwedi le kgwedi kapa wa selemo pele ho ditlhakiso.
Referense: Karolo ya 1, Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
Kenya lekeno lohle la mosebetsi le tlwaelehileng mona.
bonus_tooltip:
Khoutu 3605: Bonase/Ditefello tsa Selemo
Ditjheke tsa bo-13, dibonase tsa ts'ebetso, tjhelete ya matsatsi a phomolo.
Referense: Karolo ya 1, Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
Ditefello tsohle tsa bonase di legethohang ka botlalo.
commission_tooltip:
Khoutu 3606: Khomishene
Dikhomeshene tsa thekiso le ditefello tse thehilweng hodima ts'ebetso.
Referense: Karolo ya 1, Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
Kenya lekeno lohle la khomishene le amohetsweng.
overtime_tooltip:
Khoutu 3607: Nako e Eketsehileng
Ditefello tsa mosebetsi o fetang dihora tse tlwaelehileng.
Referense: Karolo ya 1, Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
Ditefello tsohle tsa nako e eketsehileng di legethohang.
travel_allowance_tooltip:
Khoutu 3701: Tjhelete ya Maeto
Tjhelete e amohetsweng bakeng sa ditshenyehelo tsa maeto a kgwebo.
Referense: Karolo ya 8(1)(b), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
O ka kopa ditshenyehelo tsa nnete kgahlanong le tjhelete ena.
other_allowance_tooltip:
Khoutu 3713: Ditjhelete Tse Ding
Ditjhelete tsa selefounu, khomphutha, boithabiso.
Referense: Karolo ya 1, Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
Ditjhelete tse ngata di legethohang ntle le haeba di lokollotswe ka ho kgetheha.
vehicle_fringe_tooltip:
Khoutu 3802: Molemo wa Koloi
Boleng ba tshebediso ya motho ka mong ya koloi ya k'hamphani.
Referense: Serapa sa 7, Kemiso ya Bosupa
E balwa e le peresente ya boleng ba koloi.
medical_fringe_tooltip:
Khoutu 3810: Molemo wa Bongaka
Dinehelo tsa mohiri tsa bongaka tse fetang meedi.
Referense: Karolo ya 11(a), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
Dinehelo tse fetang feela ke tsona tse legethohang.
housing_fringe_tooltip:
Khoutu 3804: Molemo wa Bolulo
Boleng ba bolulo bo fanoeng ke mohiri.
Referense: Serapa sa 9, Kemiso ya Bosupa
Bolulo ba mahala kapa bo tshehetswang bo legethohang.
meals_fringe_tooltip:
Khoutu 3808: Molemo wa Dijo
Boleng ba dijo bo fanoeng ke mohiri.
Referense: Serapa sa 11, Kemiso ya Bosupa
Melemo ya dijo e tlwaelehileng e legethohang.
other_fringe_tooltip:
Khoutu 3812: Melemo e Meng e Eketsehileng
Melemo efe kapa efe e fanoeng ke mohiri.
Referense: Kemiso ya Bosupa, Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
Melemo e mengata ya mohiri e na le ditlamorao tsa lekgetho.
interest_tooltip:
Lekeno la Phaello
Phaello ya banka, didiposito tse tsitsitseng, dibonto.
Tokollo: R23,800 (ka tlase ho 65), R34,500 (65+)
Referense: Karolo ya 10(1)(i), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
dividend_tooltip:
Lekeno la Dikabelo
Dikabelo tse tswang dikhamphaning tsa Afrika Borwa.
Tokollo: R30,000 ka selemo
Referense: Karolo ya 64B(2), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
rental_tooltip:
Lekeno la Khiriso
Lekeno le tswang matlong a khiriso.
Hlokomela: Legethohang ka botlalo, ditshenyehelo di ka tlhakiswa
Referense: Karolo ya 1, Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
paye_paid_tooltip:
PAYE (Pay-As-You-Earn)
Lekgetho le tlhakiswang kgwedi le kgwedi ke mohiri wa hao.
Referense: Kemiso ya Bone, Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
Sena se hlaha setifikeiting sa hao sa IRP5.
uif_paid_tooltip:
Dinehelo tsa UIF
Dinehelo tsa Letlole la Inshorense ya ho Hloka Mosebetsi.
Tekanyetso: 1% ya moputso (boholo R177.12/kgwedi)
Referense: Molao wa UIF
provisional_tax_tooltip:
Lekgetho la Nakoana
Lekgetho le lefilweng esale pele bakeng sa lekeno le seng la moputso.
Referense: Kemiso ya Bone, Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
E hlokeha haeba o na le lekeno le leholo le seng la mosebetsi.
pension_tooltip:
Khoutu 4001: Letlole la Phenshene
Dinehelo tsa hao letloleng la penshene la mohiri.
Meedi: E nyane ho R350,000 kapa 27.5% ya lekeno
Referense: Karolo ya 11F, Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
prov_tooltip:
Khoutu 4003: Letlole la Provident
Dinehelo tsa hao letloleng la provident la mohiri.
Meedi: E nyane ho R350,000 kapa 27.5% ya lekeno
Referense: Karolo ya 11F, Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
ra_tooltip:
Khoutu 4006: Annuity ya Phenshene
Dinehelo tsa hao tsa botho tsa annuity ya penshene.
Meedi: E nyane ho R350,000 kapa 27.5% ya lekeno
Referense: Karolo ya 11F, Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
donation_tooltip:
Khoutu 4030: Dinehelo
Dinehelo ho mekhatlo e amohetsweng ya melemo ya setjhaba.
Meedi: 10% ya lekeno le legethohang
Referense: Karolo ya 18A, Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
medaid_tooltip:
Khoutu 4005: Bongaka
Dinehelo tsa hao tsa morero wa bongaka.
Hlokomela: E theha dikalimo tsa lekgetho, eseng ditlhakiso
Referense: Karolo ya 6A, Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
medical_members_tooltip:
Dilemo tsa Bongaka
Palo ya dilemo tsa sehlooho tsa bongaka.
Krediti: R347 ka kgwedi ka setho
Referense: Karolo ya 6A, Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
medical_dependants_tooltip:
Ba Ikgethileng ka Bongaka
Palo ya ba ikgethileng ka bongaka.
Krediti: R347 (ya pele), R234 (e eketsehileng)
Referense: Karolo ya 6A, Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
addmed_tooltip:
Khoutu 4024: Bongaka bo Eketsehileng
Ditshenyehelo tsa bongaka tse sa akaretswang ke morero wa bongaka.
Meedi: Ho feta 7.5% ya lekeno le legethohang
Referense: Karolo ya 18, Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
rental_bond_tooltip:
Phaello ya Bond
Phaello e lefilweng ka kalimo ya thepa.
Hlokomela: E ka tlhakiswa kgahlanong le lekeno la khiriso
Referense: Karolo ya 11(a), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
rental_rates_tooltip:
Ditefiso le Makgetho
Ditefiso tsa masepala le makgetho a thepa.
Hlokomela: E ka tlhakiswa kgahlanong le lekeno la khiriso
Referense: Karolo ya 11(a), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
rental_insurance_tooltip:
Inshorense ya Thepa
Ditefiso tsa inshorense bakeng sa thepa ya khiriso.
Hlokomela: E ka tlhakiswa kgahlanong le lekeno la khiriso
Referense: Karolo ya 11(a), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
rental_repairs_tooltip:
Ditshebeletso le Tlhokomelo
Ditshebeletso tsa ha jwale, eseng dintlafatso.
Hlokomela: E ka tlhakiswa kgahlanong le lekeno la khiriso
Referense: Karolo ya 11(d), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
rental_depreciation_tooltip:
Tjhelete ya ho Theoha ha Boleng
Tjhelete ya ho theoha ha boleng ba moaho.
Tekanyetso: 5% ka selemo ka ditshenyehelo
Referense: Karolo ya 11(g), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
rental_agent_tooltip:
Ditefiso tsa Moemedi
Ditefiso tsa tsamaiso ya thepa le tsa khiriso.
Hlokomela: E ka tlhakiswa kgahlanong le lekeno la khiriso
Referense: Karolo ya 11(a), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
rental_other_tooltip:
Ditshenyehelo Tse Ding tsa Khiriso
Ditshenyehelo tse ding tsa khiriso tse dumellwang.
Hlokomela: E tlameha ho ba e entsweng ho fumana lekeno
Referense: Karolo ya 11(a), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
software_licenses_tooltip:
Dilaesense tsa Software
Ditshenyehelo tsa dilaesense tsa software tse amanang ka ho toba le mosebetsi wa hao wa IT (mohlala, dithulusi tsa ntshetsopele, software ya moralo).
Referense: Karolo ya 11(a), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
E tlameha ho amana ka ho toba le mesebetsi e fumanang lekeno.
hardware_upgrades_tooltip:
Dintlafatso tsa Hardware
Ditshenyehelo tsa dintlafatso tsa hardware tse hlokehang bakeng sa mosebetsi wa hao wa IT wa setsebi (mohlala, RAM, SSDs bakeng sa mechine e ikgethileng ya mosebetsi).
Referense: Karolo ya 11(a), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
E theoha boleng ka dilemo tse 3 ka 33.3% ka selemo.
medical_equipment_tooltip:
Thepa ya Bongaka
Thepa ya bongaka e bohlokwa bakeng sa tshebetso (mohlala, distethoscope, dithulusi tsa tlhahlobo).
Referense: Karolo ya 11(a), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
Distethoscope, dithulusi tsa tlhahlobo, jj.
professional_insurance_tooltip:
Inshorense ya Boikarabello ba Setsebi
Ditefiso tsa inshorense ya boikarabello ba setsebi tse hlokehang bakeng sa basebetsi ba bophelo bo botle.
Referense: Karolo ya 11(a), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
Ditefiso di ka tlhakiswa ka botlalo.
financial_software_tooltip:
Ditefiso tsa Software ya Ditjhelete
Ditefiso tsa software ya tlhahlobo ya ditjhelete, di-platform tsa kgwebo, kapa dithulusi tsa boikarabello.
Referense: Karolo ya 11(a), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
E tlameha ho sebediswa bakeng sa mesebetsi e fumanang lekeno.
market_data_tooltip:
Ditefiso tsa Data ya Mmaraka
Ditshenyehelo tsa data ya mmaraka ya nako ya nnete, ditaba tsa ditjhelete, kapa ditefiso tsa dipatlisiso.
Referense: Karolo ya 11(a), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
E tlameha ho amana ka ho toba le mosebetsi wa hao.
classroom_supplies_tooltip:
Thepa ya ho Ruta
Dibuka tsa mosebetsi, thepa ya laboratori, thepa ya bonono
Dihlokahalo: Di-oda tsa ho reka tsa sekolo, manane a thepa
Meedi: R15k moedi wa selemo
Referense: Ditataiso tsa SACE
educational_materials_tooltip:
Dithuso tsa Thuto
Thepa ya kharikhulamo e amohetsweng, di-platform tsa e-learning
Dihlokahalo: Ho tsamaellana le kharikhulamo ya CAPS
Referense: Circular ya DBE 12/2025
safety_equipment_tooltip:
Thepa ya Polokeho ya Meepo
Thepa le dithulusi tsa bohlokwa tse hlokehang bakeng sa polokeho mesebetsing ya meepo, ho kenyeletswa diaparo tse kgethehileng tsa tshireletso le thepa ya ho hema.
Referense: Karolo ya 11(a), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
occupation_specific_tooltip:
Ditshenyehelo Tse Ikgethileng tsa Mosebetsi
Dithulusi, thepa, le ditshenyehelo tse ikgethileng tsa mosebetsi wa hao.
Referense: Karolo ya 11(a), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
E tlameha ho amana ka ho toba le ho fumana lekeno.
cpd_expenses_tooltip:
Ditshenyehelo tsa CPD/Dithuto
Ntshetsopele ya setsebi e tswelang pele, disetifikeiti, thupelo.
Referense: Karolo ya 11(a), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
membership_fees_tooltip:
Ditefiso tsa Botho ba Setsebi
Ditefiso tsa selemo le selemo ho mekhatlo ya setsebi kapa mekhatlo e amanang le mosebetsi wa hao.
Referense: Karolo ya 11(a), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
books_materials_tooltip:
Dibuka & Thepa
Dibuka tsa botekgeniki, dimakasine, le thepa e nngwe ya ho ithuta e amanang ka ho toba le mosebetsi wa hao.
Referense: Karolo ya 11(a), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
tools_equipment_tooltip:
Dithulusi & Thepa
Ditshenyehelo tsa dithulusi le thepa e hlokehang bakeng sa mosebetsi wa hao.
Referense: Karolo ya 11(e), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
home_office_tooltip:
Ofisi ya Lehae
Ditshenyehelo tsa ofisi ya lehae haeba e sebediswa feela le kamehla bakeng sa merero ya kgwebo.
Referense: Karolo ya 23(b), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
travel_expenses_tooltip:
Maeto & Dipalangwang
Ditshenyehelo tse entsweng bakeng sa maeto a kgwebo, ho kenyeletswa mafura, tlhokomelo, ditefiso tsa toll, le ho paka.
Referense: Karolo ya 8(1)(b), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
fuel_expenses_tooltip:
Ditshenyehelo tsa Mafura
Ditshenyehelo tsa mafura bakeng sa maeto a kgwebo.
Hlokomela: Logbook e hlokeha.
Referense: Karolo ya 11(a), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
maintenance_expenses_tooltip:
Tlhokomelo ya Koloi
Ditshenyehelo tsa tlhokomelo ya koloi bakeng sa maeto a kgwebo.
Hlokomela: Logbook e hlokeha.
Referense: Karolo ya 11(a), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
insurance_expenses_tooltip:
Inshorense ya Koloi
Ditshenyehelo tsa inshorense ya koloi bakeng sa maeto a kgwebo.
Hlokomela: Logbook e hlokeha.
Referense: Karolo ya 11(a), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
toll_fees_tooltip:
Ditefiso tsa Toll
Ditshenyehelo tsa ditefiso tsa toll tse entsweng bakeng sa maeto a kgwebo.
Hlokomela: Boloka direseiti.
Referense: Karolo ya 11(a), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
parking_fees_tooltip:
Ditefiso tsa ho Paka
Ditshenyehelo tsa ditefiso tsa ho paka tse entsweng bakeng sa maeto a kgwebo.
Hlokomela: Boloka direseiti.
Referense: Karolo ya 11(a), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
solar_water_heater_tooltip:
Heater ya Metsi a Letsatsi
Tjhelete ya ho kenya heater ya metsi a letsatsi.
Referense: Karolo ya 12B, Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
solar_panels_tooltip:
Sistimi ya Solar PV
Tjhelete ya ho kenya sistimi ya solar PV.
Referense: Karolo ya 12B, Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
other_renewable_tooltip:
Matla a Mang a ka Nchafalang
Matsete a mang a ka nchafalang a loketseng.
Referense: Karolo ya 12B, Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
legal_fees_tooltip:
Ditefiso tsa Molao
Ditefiso tsa molao tse entsweng ho fumana lekeno.
Hlokomela: E tlameha ho amana le mesebetsi e fumanang lekeno.
Referense: Karolo ya 11(a), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
allowance_expenses_tooltip:
Ditshenyehelo tsa Tjhelete
Ditshenyehelo kgahlanong le ditjhelete tse amohetsweng.
Hlokomela: Direkoto di tlameha ho bolokwa.
Referense: Karolo ya 8(1), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno
payment_required: Tefo e hlokeha ho hlahisa PDF
pdf_error: Ho bile le phoso ha ho hlahiswa PDF. Ka kopo leka hape.
discount_applied: Khoutu ya theolelo e sebedisitswe ka katleho!
invalid_discount: Khoutu ya theolelo e sa sebetseng
professional_body_fees_tooltip:
Seo e leng sona: Kopo e felletseng e dumellwang ditefong tsa selemo le selemo ho mekgatlo ya basebetsi/mekgatlo ya setsebi e hlokehang bakeng sa mosebetsi wa hao.

Bopaki: Direseiti kapa dipolelo tsa selemo le selemo.

Khoutu ya SARS/IRP5: Khoutu 4040/4041.

Referense: Karolo ya 11(a), Molao wa Lekgetho la Lekeno; Tataiso ya SARS PAYE
uniforms_protective_clothing_tooltip:
Seo e leng sona: Ditshenyehelo tsa junifomo tse ikgethileng bakeng sa mosebetsi wa hao, tse tlamang mme e seng diaparo tse tlwaelehileng.

Meedi: E tlameha ho ba e hlakileng le e hlokehang; diaparo tse tlwaelehileng ha di tlhakiswe.

Bopaki: Di-invoice/direseiti, taelo/bopaki ba mohiri.

Khoutu ya SARS/IRP5: Khoutu 3714/3764.

Referense: Tataiso ya SARS PAYE

welcome_guide.title: TaxEasy_ZA: Tataiso e Bonolo ya ho Qala
welcome_guide.subtitle: Re o amohela ho TaxEasy_ZA! Tataiso ena e tla o thusa ho tsamaya ka har'a app le ho sebedisa ka botlalo dintho tsa yona.

steps.title: Kgetha puo ya hao
steps.description: Ka hodimo ho le letona la leqephe, kgetha puo eo o e ratang ho tswa lenaneng le theohang (Sesotho, English, Afrikaans, isiZulu, isiXhosa).

steps.title: Tlatsa tlhahisoleseding ya hao ya mosebedisi
steps.description: Leqepheng la pele, kenya ka nepo:
items: Selemo sa Lekgetho (selemo sa ha jwale se se se kgethilwe bakeng sa hao)

steps.title: Tsamaea ka har'a Dikgaba
steps.description: Kamora ho tlatsa karolo ya 'Tlhahisoleseding ya Motho ka Mong', tobetsa 'E Latelang'. App e hlophisitswe ka dikarolo tse hlakileng:

subsections.name: Lekeno & Tlhahisoleseding ya IRP5
subsections.description: Mona o tla kenya tlhahisoleseding mabapi le moputso, ditjhelete, melemo e eketsehileng, lekeno la matsete, le lekgetho le seng le lefilwe.

subsections.name: Ditlhakiso Tse Akaretsang
subsections.description: Mona o kenya ditlhakiso tse akaretsang le ditshenyehelo tsa bongaka.

subsections.name: Ditlhakiso Tse Tswetseng Pele le tsa Mosebetsi
subsections.description: Haeba ho loketse, kgetha mosebetsi wa hao ho notlolla ditlhakiso tse ikgethileng.

steps.title: Sebedisa Dikgoba tsa ho Tsamaya
steps.description: Sebedisa dikgoba tsena ho tsamaya ka har'a app:
items: Tobetsa 'E Latelang' ho ya karolong e latelang
Tobetsa 'E Fetileng' ho kgutlela morao ho hlahloba kapa ho hlophisa tlhahisoleseding e fetileng

sections.title: Ho Utlwisisa Ditlhahiso le Dithuso
sections.description: Ho pholletsa le app, o tla bona ditshwantsho tsa matshwao a dipotso (?) haufi le masimo a fapaneng. Tsena di fana ka ditlhaloso tse qaqileng mabapi le:
items: Seo lebala le leng le le leng le se bolelang

sections.title: Ho Utlwisisa Kakaretso ya Lekgetho la Hao
sections.description: Kamora ho kenya tlhahisoleseding yohle, o tla fihla leqepheng la 'Kakaretso ya Lekgetho'. O tla bona tse latelang:

sections.title: Diketso tsa Bohlokwa Leqepheng la Kakaretso ya Lekgetho

actions.description: Hang ha o kgotsofetse ka kakaretso ya hao, o ka hlahisa tlaleho ya PDF ka tefiso e nyane.
Sebedisa konopo ena ho lefa ka polokeho bakeng sa tlaleho ya hao ya PDF.
Haeba o na le khoutu ya theolelo, e kenye lebaleng le fanoeng mme o tobetse 'Etsa Kopo'.
Haeba o hlophisa tlhahisoleseding efe kapa efe ya hao, tobetsa 'Bala Hape' ho ntlafatsa kakaretso.

sections.title: O Hloka Thuso?
sections.description: Tobetsa 'Dipotso Tse Botlwa Hangata' ka hodimo ho le letona la leqephe ho fumana dipotso le dikarabo tse tlwaelehileng.

welcome_guide.closing_message: Re tshepa hore tataiso ena e tla o thusa ho sebedisa TaxEasy_ZA ka katleho!

livestock_depreciation_tooltip: Ho fokolla boleng ba liphoofolo: Litefiso tsa ho fokolla boleng ba liphoofolo tse sebediswang bakeng sa limō tsa temo ka lebaka la dilemo, ho reta, kapa mabaka a mang.
safety_training_tooltip: Ditshenyehelo tsa Thupelo ya Polokeho: Ditshenyehelo tse entsweng bakeng sa thupelo ya polokeho e tlamang le setifikeiti se hlokehang bakeng sa ditsebi tsa meepo.
